summary: REQ-4 was not implemented: the diff does not show any changes to `frontend/src/App.tsx` to restore the Sweta romantic copy and 29 November reference. Additionally, a constrained/forbidden file (`frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`) was modified and an unrequested `project_state.json` file was added.
